</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"orderSheetNo":{"type":"string","description":"주문서 번호. items[].channelType 이 존지해는 경우 서버에서 주문서번호 생성함. (nullable)","example":"202001010101"},"extraData":{"type":"string","description":"쇼핑몰에서 사용 할 extraData (nullable)","example":"{}"},"clientReturnUrl":{"type":"string","description":"이동URL","example":"http://localhost:8080"},"nvadid":{"type":"string","description":"SA CLICK ID. 네이버 검색광고 이용 가맹점 중 광고주 센터의 광고 효과 보고서를 통해 네이버페이 전환 데이터를 확인하길 원하는 가맹점은 SA로부터 받은 추적 URL 파라미터 중 NVADID를 입력. (nullable)","example":"nvadid"},"naCo":{"type":"string","description":"네이버 서비스 유입 경로 코드. (nullable)","example":"naCo"},"items":{"type":"array","description":"구매상품","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"channelType":{"type":"string","description":"채널타입","example":"PAYCO"},"orderCnt":{"type":"number","description":"상품개수","example":1},"optionInputs":{"type":"array","description":"옵션","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"inputValue":{"type":"string","description":"옵션 입력값","example":"1"},"inputLabel":{"type":"string","description":"옵션 입력라벨","example":"상품"}}}},"optionNo":{"type":"number","description":"옵션번호","example":1},"productNo":{"type":"number","description":"상품번호","example":1},"additionalProductNo":{"type":"number","description":"추가상품번호 (nullable)","example":1}}}}},"description":"","title":"payments-naver-ordersheet-1158900846"},"examples":{"post-payments-naver-ordersheet":{"value":"{\"items\":[{\"productNo\":1,\"optionNo\":1,\"additionalProductNo\":1,\"orderCnt\":1,\"optionInputs\":[{\"inputLabel\":\"1\",\"inputValue\":\"1\"}],\"channelType\":\"PAYCO\"}],\"clientReturnUrl\":\"http://localhost\",\"naCo\":\"naCo\",\"nvadid\":\"nvadid\",\"extraData\":null}"}}}}}}
